title: Welcome to free writing
content:
Hey, welcome to free writing. I'm Neil, The app developer.

This free writing is a bit different than what you might expect. The goal here, unlike normal free writing, is to pay as little attention as possible to what you write. 

This technique helps soothe anxiety and tension by allowing you to bring troubling thoughts to the surface and let them go.

title: The Three Don'ts
content:
Whenever free writing: 

- Never stop to think, just keep writing.

- Never censor yourself or edit your writing - It's alright to write things that you don't agree with.

- Never read what you wrote or show other people - the goal is to never judge what comes out

title: What to expect
content:
It'll take time to develop the skills necessary to start letting go of negative thoughts and feelings quickly. 

After 3 years of free writing it only takes 5 minutes to get rid of most of my anxiety. But when I was starting it took much longer.

When first beginning, it may take a while of writing before you start feeling like that weight of anxiety is being lifted off your chest. Keep at it and don't give up.

title: Tips for beginners
content:
If you have trouble writing, try starting with a leading sentence and writing from there. 

Such as "I feel like..." or "I am anxious because..." and let yourself write whatever comes to your mind. 

You can also try just writing gibberish. If you can't think of what to write just start pressing random letters until you've got your flow again.
